00045 template <class TYPE>
00046 class FUParameterT
00047 {
00048 private:
00049     TYPE value;
00050 
00051 public:
00052     FUParameterT() {}
00053     FUParameterT(const TYPE& defaultValue) : value(defaultValue) {}
00054     virtual ~FUParameterT() {}
00055     inline operator TYPE&() { return value; }
00056     inline operator const TYPE&() const { return value; }
00057     inline TYPE& operator *() { return value; }
00058     inline const TYPE& operator *() const { return value; }
00059     inline TYPE* operator->() { return &value; }
00060     inline const TYPE* operator->() const { return &value; }
00061     FUParameterT<TYPE>& operator= (const TYPE& copy) { value = copy; return *this; }
00062 };
00063 
00064 typedef FUParameterT<bool> FUParameterBoolean; 
00065 typedef FUParameterT<float> FUParameterFloat; 
00066 typedef FUParameterT<FMVector2> FUParameterVector2; 
00067 typedef FUParameterT<FMVector3> FUParameterVector3; 
00068 typedef FUParameterT<FMVector3> FUParameterColor3; 
00069 typedef FUParameterT<FMVector4> FUParameterVector4; 
00070 typedef FUParameterT<FMVector4> FUParameterColor4; 
00071 typedef FUParameterT<FMMatrix44> FUParameterMatrix44; 
00072 typedef FUParameterT<int32> FUParameterInt32; 
00073 typedef FUParameterT<uint32> FUParameterUInt32; 
00074 typedef FUParameterT<fm::string> FUParameterString; 
00075 typedef FUParameterT<fstring> FUParameterFString; 
00077 typedef fm::vector<float, true> FUParameterFloatList; 
00078 typedef fm::vector<FMVector2, true> FUParameterVector2List; 
00079 typedef fm::vector<FMVector3, true> FUParameterVector3List; 
00080 typedef fm::vector<FMVector3, true> FUParameterColor3List;

00084 typedef fm::vector<int32, true> FUParameterInt32List; 
00085 typedef fm::vector<uint32, true> FUParameterUInt32List; 
00086 typedef fm::vector<fm::string, false> FUParameterStringList; 
00087 typedef fm::vector<fstring, false> FUParameterFStringList; 
00089 #define DeclareParameter(type, qual, parameterName, niceName) \
00090     class Parameter_##parameterName : public FUParameterT<type> { \
00091     public: Parameter_##parameterName() : FUParameterT<type>() {} \
00092     Parameter_##parameterName(const type& defaultValue) : FUParameterT<type>(defaultValue) {} \
00093     virtual ~Parameter_##parameterName() {} \
00094     inline Parameter_##parameterName& operator= (const type& copy) { FUParameterT<type>::operator=(copy); return *this; } \
00095     } parameterName;
00096 
00097 #define DeclareParameterPtr(type, parameterName, niceName) FUTrackedPtr<type> parameterName;
00098 #define DeclareParameterRef(type, parameterName, niceName) FUObjectRef<type> parameterName;
00099 #define DeclareParameterList(list_type, parameterName, niceName) FUParameter##list_type##List parameterName;
00100 #define DeclareParameterTrackList(type, parameterName, niceName) FUTrackedList<type> parameterName;
00101 #define DeclareParameterContainer(type, parameterName, niceName) FUObjectContainer<type> parameterName;

00107 #define ImplementParameterObjectNoArgT(objectClassName, parameterClassName, parameterName)
00108 #define ImplementParameterObjectNoCtrT(objectClassName, parameterClassName, parameterName)
